name: Creature Clash (ubercj, gabesenacom)
description:
Creature Clash is a memory matching card game developed by Chris Jones, Adrián Moncada, and Gabriel Sena.

Check out the repository on GitHub.

This game is an entry for the 2021 Game Jam organized by the community at The Odin Project. The theme for the Game Jam was "Edutainment" - a combination of education and entertainment.

We had a lot of ideas for our game, but we eventually settled on Creature Clash, a memory matching card game heavily inspired by the existing board game Chicken Cha Cha Cha.
